summary: Peter, a family man who works for a failing supermarket chain finds his life shaken up by his new boss, Susan, who starts to groom him for an executive position. Money and opportunities are within his grasp, but at what price?
cast: Eric Mabius|Matt Servitto|Annie Parisse|Finn Donoghue|Victor Cruz|Amy Schumer|Josh Pais|Parker Posey|Brian Berrebbi|Xosha Roquemore|Samrat Chakrabarti|Matt Walker|Mylinda Hull|Marceline Hugot|Remy Auberjonois|Faith Sandberg|Edward Herrmann|Juan Luis Acevedo|Stephen Kunken|Steve Park|Jennifer Mudge|John Fugelsang|Cheyenne Jackson|Dean Wareham|Britta Phillips|Natalie Best|Joseph D'Onofrio|Jayce Bartok|Shea Curtin|Frank Amoruso|Joseph Borzotta|Julia Bray|Teena Byrd|Elle Donoghue|Christopher Douros|Nicholas Martorell Jr.|Elizabeth Masucci|Leslie C. Nemet|Mike O'Brien|Meghan Anne Riley|Nate Steinwachs|Isaac Wilson|A.J. Wladyka
title: Price Check
